title: EdgeNGramTokenizerFactory not tokenizing the fields value
description: I have created new Field type with the EdgeNGramTokenizerFactory but it is not spliting the data hence results are not appearing for GramValues. Kindly fix it.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please raise this kind of question over on the user's list before raising a JIRA. This is probably a mis-configuration or mis-understanding on your part and you'll get lots of help on the user's list (see: http://lucene.apache.org/solr/discussion.html for instructions on how to subscribe to that list).

And if you do discover that it's a bona-fide bug, please provide enough detail to reproduce the problem you see.
